text: Jerry Douglas (born May 28, 1956) is an American Grammy Award-winning dobro player. He was born in Warren, Ohio. Over the years, he has worked with musicians including Ray Charles, Peter Rowan, BÃ©la Fleck, Emmylou Harris, Phish, Chris Thile, Dolly Parton, Paul Simon, Ricky Skaggs, Bill Frisell, John Fogerty, Nanci Griffith, Tony Rice, and James Taylor. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Ohio Category:Bluegrass musicians Category:Country musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: Jerry Douglas
